title: Product pricing
content:
Prices on TikTok Shop are set at the SKU level, and the allowable price range varies based on your shop's region and operation mode.

Local sellers
Country	Allowable Price Range

Brazil
	
0.5 – 10,000


France
	
0.01 – 6,300


Germany
	
0.01 – 6,300


Indonesia
	
100 – 100,000,000 (A discounted price less than 2000 IDR may lead to a negative balance)


Ireland
	
0.01 – 6,300


Italy
	
0.01 – 6,300


Japan
	
1 – 500,000


Malaysia
	
0.01 – 320,000


Mexico
	
1 – 50,000


Philippines
	
0.01 – 400,000


Singapore
	
0.01 – 10,000


Spain
	
0.01 – 6,300


Thailand
	
30 – 260,000


United Kingdom
	
0.01 – 5,600


United States
	
0.01 – 7,600


Vietnam
	
1 – 180,000,000
Intra-EU sellers
Country	Allowable Price Range

France
	
0.01 – 6,300


Germany
	
0.01 – 6,300


Ireland
	
0.01 – 6,300


Italy
	
0.01 – 6,300


Spain
	
0.01 – 6,300
Global sellers
